rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with natural lighting and traditional design.
Open-concept living, dining, and kitchen space that blends modern industrial elements with farmhouse aesthetics.
Separate room allocated for domestic help.
A compact private gym designed with industrial finishes and Vastu-compliant positioning.

openings.description: Large double door entrance with robust industrial style.
Access to the garden, ensuring a seamless transition from indoor to outdoor living.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with ample storage and Vastu-aligned east-facing window.
Extra room for storage or workspace, incorporating local design norms.

openings.description: Balcony overlooking the garden for fresh air and natural light.
Stairs connecting the two floors, integrated into the design to maximize space.
